alldb.table_sql:
SELECT C.ID AS id, C.CONTRACT_ID AS contractid, C.CONTRACT_NUMBER contractnumber, C.CUST_ID AS custid, C.PROJ_ID AS pid, P.PROJ_ID AS proj_id, ci1.cust_name custname, ci2.cust_name custdealer, CI2.ID AS custdealerid, C.PROJECT_NAME projname, DICT.NAME_ AS projtype, DICT2.NAME_ AS projsource, DICT3.NAME_ AS projscale , DICT4.NAME_ AS industrytype, DICT5.NAME_ AS leasform , DICT6.NAME_ AS businesstype, DICT7.NAME_ AS businessmode, DICT8.NAME_ AS ownerdistrict, '{palndate_end}' AS PALNDATE, T.REALNAME_ AS projmanage, need_rent.penalty as penalty, nvl(payrent1,0.0)-nvl(payrent2,0.0) as receivablerent ,pln.rent yrent FROM CONTRACT_INFO C left join cust_info ci1 on ci1.id = c.cust_id left join cust_info ci2 on ci2.id = c.cust_dealer LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO_DEALER CD ON CI2.ID = CD.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT ON C.PROJ_TYPE=DICT.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT2 ON C.PROJ_SOURCE=DICT2.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT3 ON C.PROJ_SCALE=DICT3.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT4 ON C.INDUSTRY_TYPE=DICT4.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT5 ON C.LEAS_FORM=DICT5.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT6 ON C.BUSINESS_TYPE=DICT6.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT7 ON C.BUSINESS_MODE=DICT7.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT8 ON CD.OWNER_DISTRICT=DICT8.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_USERS T ON C.PROJ_MANAGE=T.ID_ LEFT JOIN PROJ_INFO P ON P.ID=C.PROJ_ID left join ( select * from contract_fund_rent_plan pln where pln.rent_list=1 )pln on c.id=pln.contract_id left join (select nvl(sum(rent), 0.00) as payrent1 ,nvl(sum(penalty), 0.00) as penalty,rentplan.contract_id from contract_fund_rent_plan rentplan
where 1=1 /~palndate_start: AND PLAN_DATE >= '{palndate_start}'~/ /~palndate_end: AND PLAN_DATE <= '{palndate_end}'~/
group by rentplan.contract_id) need_rent on need_rent.contract_id = c.id left join (select rentincome.contract_id, nvl(sum(rentincome.rent), 0.00) + nvl(sum(rentincome.RENT_ADJUST), 0.00) as payrent2 from contract_fund_rent_plan rentplan left join contract_fund_rent_income rentincome ON (rentplan.id=rentincome.plan_id) where 1=1 /~palndate_start: AND rentplan.PLAN_DATE >= '{palndate_start}'~/ /~palndate_end: AND rentplan.PLAN_DATE <= '{palndate_end}'~/ group by rentincome.contract_id) has_rent on has_rent.contract_id = c.id where 1=1 /~total: /~CONTRACT_STATUS_LessThan: and C.CONTRACT_STATUS < '{CONTRACT_STATUS_LessThan}'~/ /~CONTRACT_STATUS_GreaterThan: and C.CONTRACT_STATUS > '{CONTRACT_STATUS_GreaterThan}'~/ /~hasMoney: and NVL(PAYRENT1, 0.0) - NVL(PAYRENT2, 0.0) > 0 ~/ ~/
/~dealer_id: and c.cust_dealer = '{dealer_id}' ~/ /~custname: and ci1.cust_name like '%{custname}%' ~/ /~contractid: and C.CONTRACT_ID like '%{contractid}%' ~/ /~contractnumber: and C.CONTRACT_NUMBER like '%{contractnumber}%' ~/ /~projname: and C.PROJECT_NAME like '%{projname}%' ~/ /~projtype: and DICT.NAME_ = '{projtype}' ~/ /~custdealer: and ci2.cust_name like '%{custdealer}%' ~/
